name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Data Engineer with over 10 years of experience in **Machine Learning**, **Natural Language Processing**, and **Computer Vision**. Expert in building complex data pipelines and backend systems tailored for financial platforms and AI/ML projects. Proven proficiency in engineering management and technical leadership, facilitating cross-functional collaboration to drive successful project outcomes. Skilled in **Python** (FastAPI, Django, Flask) and deploying applications on **AWS** and **Azure**, delivering high-performance APIs and scalable services. Strong communicator and mentor, with a solid record of enhancing team capabilities and fostering continuous improvement in Lean environments. Contributed to impactful projects at leading organizations including VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska.
